ygData.subject: Re: Ding ding!
ygData.msgSnippet: Though my game experience compared to yours is at a ratio of 1 : 500 . But then,  Monks are able to tank just as nice as plate wearing goons ;-) And besides,
ygData.messageBody:
Though my game experience compared to yours is at a ratio of 1 : 500 . But
then, Monks are able to tank just as nice as plate wearing goons ;-) And
besides, its a matter of perception.

Just another Monk-ey like YiYang...
Inno

----- Original Message -----
From: Sereph <garford@...>
> Tohlong lah at high lvls, only plate wearing goons with the 3 evading
skill can
> tank. Monk, rouge, ranger and bards all cannot tank past then. Only job
for
> monks is to do huge ammount of damage with their fist, and let the tanks
taunt
> the mob away from them.
>
> The day monks can tank past 35, is the day my enchanter stop meleeing mobs
with
> my skull staff :)
>
> Sabella Anna Estasis, tank mage of EQ.
